00025 void TargetImgLabel::setImage(const QImage &labelImage)
00026 {

00028 //   m_image = new QImage(labelImage.size(), QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied);
00029 //   *m_image = labelImage;
00030 
00031    this->resize(m_image->size());
00032    m_bHasImage = true;
00033    m_bHasOverlayImage = false;
00034 
00035    update();
00036 }

00058 void TargetImgLabel::paintEvent(QPaintEvent * /* event */)
00059 {
00060    if(m_bHasImage)
00061       {
00062 
00063       // had originally only this:
00064 //      QPainter painter(this);
00065 //      painter.drawImage(0, 0, *m_image);
00066 
00067           QImage imageWithOverlay = QImage(m_image->size(), QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied);
00068           QPainter painter(&imageWithOverlay);
00069 
00070           painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_Source);
00071           painter.fillRect(imageWithOverlay.rect(), Qt::transparent);
00072 
00073           painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver);
00074           painter.drawImage(0, 0, *m_image);
00075 
00076       if(m_bHasOverlayImage)
00077          {
00078 //         painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver);  // Opaque image
00079 //         painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_Exclusion);   // Bluish transparency overlay
00080          painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_Screen);
00081          painter.drawImage(0, 0, *m_overlayImage);
00082          }
00083 
00084 
00085        if(m_bHasCorrResults)
00086           {
00087           painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver);
00088 
00089           painter.setPen(QPen(Qt::green, 3, Qt::DashDotLine, Qt::RoundCap,
00090            Qt::RoundJoin));
00091           painter.setBrush( Qt::NoBrush);
00092            QRect rect(m_originPoint, m_rectSize);
00093           painter.drawRect(rect);
00094          }
00095 
00096        painter.end();
00097 
00098        QPainter painter2(this);
00099        painter2.drawImage(0, 0, imageWithOverlay);
00100        painter2.end();
00101 
00102       }
00103 }

00105 void TargetImgLabel::drawEnclosedMatch(const QPoint originPoint, const QSize rectSize)
00106 {
00107    m_originPoint = originPoint;
00108    m_rectSize = rectSize;
00109 
00110    m_bHasCorrResults = true;
00111 
00112    update();
00113 }
00114 
00115 void TargetImgLabel::eraseEnclosedMatch()
00116 {
00117    m_bHasCorrResults = false;
00118    m_bHasOverlayImage = false;
00119 }
